description: The price of Tecno Pop 1S is only BDT 7,490. Tecno Pop 1s brings some great features Fingerprint, G-sensor, Proximity, Ambient Light Sensor. It’s a 4G tech dual-SIM smartphone. Pop 1S is available in Champagne Gold, Black and Coral Blue colors. This is a 5.5 inches, 74.5 cm2 (~69.7% screen-to-body ratio), IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors display with 720 x 1440 pixels, 18:9 ratio (~282 ppi density) resolution. The camera has 2 dual cameras with 8 MP and 2.0 Apertures. The front has a 5 MP camera with Touch Focus. It is powered by 3000 mAh Li-ion battery, which runs the MediaTek processor and offers 1 GB of RAM and 16 GB of ROM.
